title: First Flawless Game
body:
Just had a flawless game with Zed. {{champion:238}} 13/0/10. 

He's bonkers when you can line up 3 Shurikens at the right target.

replies.body: No sword of the Occult? GG noob

Even if i'm wrecking face, all it takes is one death and all that gold is wasted on a pretty shitty item.

I'd rather just stick to a normal build.
Never has a gif been more accurate. Only replace Chain harpoon of death with shurikens. Thousands of them.
